responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[4BE4F0A16D08556ACD6685BF392E6719]", "CEAA9868489B16C01120BCB73EA6625B", "As you press the sequence, the pillar hums loudly. A hidden compartment slides open at its base, revealing a small, dust-covered coffer! The light from the runes then fades, and the gems are consumed by the pillar\'s energy. Opening the coffer reveals an inscribed ring that sends an unpleasant sensation down your fingertips when touched.")
name: ANV_FTUE_HR_0009_ThoseThatRemained_Pillar_Anvil_DLG_8_Response
